Getting questions from clients about recent Bitcoin “death cross”, so worth showing the data:

Since 2011:
>Many occurred near major bottoms (2011, 2015, 2020, 2023)
>6-month median subsequent return: +30%
>12-month median: +89%
>Positive hit rate: 64%
